name: Andrew (Canceled)
blurb: An emotional journey through the depths of the mind from the state of depression and grief to finding what it means to be truly happy.

rewards.reward: No Reward

EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS - And seriously, a dollar here and there can really add up! For donating just a dollar or more, you will get your name featured in the credits of the game in the "Kickstarter Backers" section.

HIGH FIVE! - Get a digital copy of the soundtrack upon release, as well as an exclusive backer wallpaper in your resolution and a shout out on the Andrew Facebook page!\r\nIncludes EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS.

GAME ON! - At this level, you will get a DRM-free digital copy of the game upon release available for Windows, Mac, and Linux, an exclusive backer wallpaper (in your resolution), your name in the credits, and a shout out on Facebook!

C-C-C-COMBO! - Get a DRM-free digital copy of the game upon release available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. But, wait! For donating at least $12, you will also get a digital copy of the soundtrack when it is ready for release!\r\nIncludes GAME ON! and above.
BETA TIME! - Get everything from "C-C-C-COMBO!" as well as a limited lower price entry into beta access.

TWO IS BETA THAN ONE - By donating at least $20, you will not only get digital copies of the game and soundtrack, but an extra copy of each for a friend! The first 250 to donate at least $20 will also get a beta key for themselves and one extra for a friend!\r\n\r\nIncludes C-C-C-COMBO! and above.
SHARING IS CARING - You weren't one of the first 250 people to hit the $20 dollar tier, but still feel free to enjoy the extra copies of the game and soundtrack.\r\nIncludes C-C-C-COMBO! and above.

THOU ART WORTHY - Get everything that you would with the limited $20 reward tier, including two beta keys, but also get an exclusive and extensive PDF Behind The Scenes Art Booklet.\r\nIncludes TWO IS BETA THAN ONE and above.

POSTER? I HARDLY KNOW HER - By donating at least $30, you will get everything from the $25 tier (including two beta keys) as well as a limited edition 16"x20" semi-gloss game poster, with a personalized "thank you" and signature on it.\r\n\r\nIncludes THOU ART WORTHY and above.

PLUSHIE! - At this reward tier, you will get everything from the $25 tier as well as a hand-made 8" Andrew plushie! They're freaking adorable, and I am the proud owner of one myself. (This is also just a hint of what's to come! Expect a variety of other Andrew-themed plushies to be available as the game develops.)\r\nIncludes THOU ART WORTHY and above.

TIER ONE TEE - This reward tier comes with everything from the $25 reward tier as well as an "'Andrew'  Logo" tee! I will contact you for sizing after the funding period ends.\r\nIncludes THOU ART WORTHY and above.

TIER TWO TEE - This reward tier comes with everything from the $25 reward tier as well as an "Andrew's Haunting Reflection" tee! I will contact you for sizing after the funding period ends.\r\nIncludes THOU ART WORTHY and above.

GETTING PHYSICAL - Choose two of the four choices above (poster, t-shirts, and plushies) and also get the special "Backer" edition physical copy of the game, exclusive only to backers. Also includes THOU ART WORTHY and above.

COLLECTOR - At this reward tier, you can pick three of the four following choices on top of your copies of the game: "Reflection" poster, logo tee, "Reflection" tee, and/or a plush doll.\r\nIncludes special "Backer" edition physical copy of game and special edition physical soundtrack as well as THOU ART WORTHY and above.

LET'S GET GRAPHICAL - Take your pick of three choices from the $100 reward tier and then add on your very own limited hardcover copy of the graphic novelization of Andrew!\r\nIncludes COLLECTOR as well as limited alpha access when the time comes.

SUPER COLLECTOR - Get the limited edition graphic novel of Andrew from the above tier, but with this tier, you don't have to choose three of the four choices. Get both t-shirts, the poster, and TWO plush dolls (perfect for a gift or for the ultimate collector) for $200 or more!\r\n\r\nIncludes the special "Backer" edition physical copy of the game and physical soundtrack as well as THOU ART WORTHY and above, as well as limited alpha access to the game (and a bonus alpha access key for a friend).
WHAT A CONCEPT! - Get everything from "SUPER COLLECTOR" and above as well as a signed original piece of concept art

DESPAIR - Help me design a common enemy for the first level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Despair.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

GUILT - Help me design a common enemy for the second level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Guilt.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

ENVY - Help me design a common enemy for the third level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Envy.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

LOW SELF-ESTEEM - Help me design a common enemy for the fourth level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Low Self-Esteem.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

ANGER - Help me design a common enemy for the fifth level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Anger.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

BITTERNESS - Help me design a common enemy for the sixth level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Bitterness.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

DOUBT - Help me design a common enemy for the seventh level of the game based around the theme of the boss: Doubt.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

GRIEF - Help me design an enemy for the eighth level of the game based around the theme of the final boss: Grief.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

??? - Help me design a common enemy for the bonus level of the game based around the theme of ???. You will find out what the theme is after the funding period ends and we start talking to get designing.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" but the signed concept art that you get is of the enemy that you helped me design.

KEEP YOUR FRIENDS CLOSE - Help me design a character in the game, whether its based off of you or not, and see them during the story.\r\nNOTICE: Also included is everything from "WHAT A CONCEPT!" and above, but the signed concept art that you get is of the character that you helped me design.

PRODUCER STATUS - Get everything from the "KEEP YOUR FRIENDS CLOSE" tier and below, as well as be featured in the opening of the game as a producer for the game. You will also have your own featured bio in a section of the main menu so that you can stand out amongst the rest.\r\nNOTICE: Comes along with only designing one enemy for the level of your choosing.

DESIGN A LEVEL - Not only will you get PRODUCER STATUS and everything that comes along with it, but you will be able to Skype or meet with me face to face (depending on distance) to have creative input on level and puzzle design for the level of your choosing, including input on how to defeat the boss of that specific level. Choices on level will be first come, first serve.\r\nYou will also receive some signed concept work that I do for the level and puzzles that you helped with.\r\nIncludes PRODUCER STATUS and below.

PAX (EXECUTIVE PRODUCER) - I plan on showing Andrew at PAX in 2014, and with your support, that will become a reality. Take a chance to not only be featured in the game as Executive Producer (and introduced as that at PAX), but take the opportunity to present my game at PAX while sitting by my side at the Andrew booth. You can help with the setup and tear down of the booth and watch people coming and going, experiencing Andrew for the first time. See the expo in a whole other light. Included with this tier will be flight arrangements of my choosing (most likely business class or higher) to and from the convention and a paid hotel room (of my choosing) for the length of PAX, so no need to tack on the extra money for those expenses or worry about getting the money for them when the time comes.
